    • Method Detail

      • loadModel

        public void loadModel(java.lang.String location,
                      boolean download)
        Loads the file at the specified location. if download flag is true it will download the model to that location and load it.
        Parameters:
        location - Location of model or location to download model too
        download - if true it will attempt to download the model if it's not there already

      • classify

        public java.lang.String classify(PImage image)
        Classifies the image and returns the best class
        Parameters:
        image - Input image to be classified
        Returns:
        best result
